definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: The developments and current situation of tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了钽铌湿法冶金技术的发展概况和现状。

sentences.english: The niobium-tantalum and rare-earths ore deposits in China and their occurred minerals are described.
sentences.chinese: 该文对我国铌钽稀土矿床及其产出的矿物进行了论述。

sentences.english: Orientation and polarization methods of as-grown KNbO_3 polydomain crystal are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了生成态铌酸钾多畴晶体的定向和单畴化方法。

sentences.english: The enrichment and recovery of tantalum and niobium through acid leaching and sodium alkali fusing from tungsten residue is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸与钠碱熔融法从钨渣中富集和回收钽铌。

sentences.english: This method has been applied to the determination of Nb in rocks with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 经纸色层分离，用于矿样中痕量铌的测定，结果满意。

sentences.english: The above particles were also complex particles containing Ti and Nb.
sentences.chinese: 上述颗粒均为含铌和钛的复合碳氮化物。

sentences.english: The citrate method was adopted to prepare LiNbO3 ferroelectric film.
sentences.chinese: 采用柠檬酸盐法制备铌酸锂铁电薄膜。

sentences.english: We export Titanium, Tantalum, Niobium, Zirconium and Nickel materials and finished products, kindly contact for inquiry!
sentences.chinese: 我司出口钛，钽，铌，锆，铌金属材料及其制品。

sentences.english: We export Titanium, Tantalum, Niobium, Zirconium and Nickel materials and finished products, kindly contact for inquiry!
sentences.chinese: 我司出口钛，钽，铌，锆，铌金属材料及其制品。

sentences.english: Secondly, two novel ROF system schemes based on the LiNbO3 phase modulator are accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 采用铌酸锂相位调制器设计了两种新型的ROF系统。

sentences.english: Experiment is done on the acid hydrolysis of titanium-columbite-tantalite ore difficult to decompose.
sentences.chinese: 对难分解的钛钽铌矿的酸分解工艺进行了试验研究。

sentences.english: The amount of NbC depends on the adding amount of Nb.
sentences.chinese: 碳化铌的数量与铌的加入量有关。

sentences.english: The amount of NbC depends on the adding amount of Nb.
sentences.chinese: 碳化铌的数量与铌的加入量有关。

sentences.english: Niobium is a soft metal used in producing superconducting steel.
sentences.chinese: 铌是制造超导钢制品的一种软金属。

sentences.english: The part two is of oxide characteristics of uranium-niobium alloy.
sentences.chinese: 另一部分是铀铌合金的氧化特性研究工作。

sentences.english: Uses: cold welding of nonferrous metals such as Cu Al Ag Ni Pt Sn Zn Ta and some of their alloys.
sentences.chinese: 钽铌等有色金属线材及他们部分合金线材的焊接。
